summary: A PyTorch Lightning module that encapsulates a neural network for determining the parity (odd or even) of MNIST digit images, handling model initialization, optimizer configuration, forward inference, data loading, and per‑batch training logic.
business_intent: To provide a reusable, plug‑and‑play component for quickly training and evaluating parity‑based classification models on the MNIST dataset, supporting rapid prototyping and educational demonstrations of deep learning workflows.
